verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: flew] [ARG1: on southwest airlines] [ARGM-PRP: to see how it compared to delta] and united i flew southwest airlines for the second time in my life as i traveled from new york city to st louis missouri in october the plane cleanliness and entertainment options as well as the ability to check my suitcase for free were the biggest highlights southwest airlines delta new york city delta air lines southwest
